caption: The two men are talking with the woman, but the woman doesn’t like the way she is called. One of the men has a friend visited and the friend gets off from a police car. And he leaves the room after taking something. And then the woman leaves the room after talking to the remaining man in the room on the sofa. However, and first man comes back and leaves the room with the last man in the room. They take a taxi and memorize the thing happened before. Finally, they get into a place with the permission of a woman, and argue with a man near an entrance of a building.
